project.name: AI to Write
project.shortDescription: AI-powered writing tool for open source documentation.
project.needSummary: Looking for co-founder who is passionate about software documentation, a UX designer, and a full stack dev.
project.elevatorPitch: AI-powered writing tool for open source documentation.
project.problem: Drive adoption of open source projects with well-written documentation.
project.mission: To create a general purpose writing tool that helps people write better.

cofounderGoals.reason: Looking for a software developer passionate about documentation.

availableRoles.title: Software Engineer
availableRoles.description: Full stack developer to implement features.

compensationOfferings.title: Most Popular
compensationOfferings.description: Contributors get 1% of their normal rate in cash, and the remaining 99% in Contributor Credits* at 3 credits per dollar.

compensationOfferings.title: Custom
compensationOfferings.description: Compensation amounts and options will be based on the qualifications of individual and the service he or she is providing

users.title: Founder
users.bio: I'm primarily a technical writer. I have also worked as a documentation tools engineer and a data analyst. I'm passionate about technical communication and writing. I have worked at Ericsson, Dell, Yahoo, and Amazon. I live in Santa Clara, California.
